:doodle { @grid: 11 / 100vmax; background: #0a0c27; position: absolute; top: 0; left: 0; height: 100%; z-index: -1; } --n: calc( @abs(@abs(@row() - 6) + @abs(@col() - 6) - 11) / 11 ); margin: -10%; transform: rotate(45deg); border: 1px solid; border-color: hsla( calc(var(--n) * 280 + 120), 60%, 68%, var(--n) );
